marks: Signature and Date [Falls of St. Anthony in 1848 H. Lewis, 1855]
text: From 1846 to 1848, Lewis worked up and down the Mississippi River making sketches for a huge panorama which he completed in Cincinnati in 1849. This painting is based on one of those earlier sketches, and was painted while Lewis was living in DÃ¼sseldorf, Germany.
title: St. Anthony Falls As It Appeared in 1848
